input.sentences: the landscaping around the apartments were well taken care of .
the apartments were close in proximity .
this was one of the older apartments on the block .
the corner lots offered plenty of shade .
the architecture was unique compared to the other buildings .
output.sentences: I love taking walks to look at landscaping and architecture near my apartments.
I find comfort in the proximity of these closely built apartments.
But these huge blocks are not just apartments, they are a landscape of their own.
Like a forest, this landscape can offer plenty of shade.
This environment itself is quite unique, with the odd shapes compared to other buildings.
